Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.branch

Class BranchMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.branch.BranchMap
  • public class BranchMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to manage all the current branches of actions the player has access to. It selects the branches that are still legally possible after every actiaon chosen by the player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<Branch> branches
      List of branches of actions that the map is managing
      IEvent<BranchMap,​java.lang.Boolean> endOfBranchMapReachedEvent
      Event other classes can subscribe to (when it is invoked it notifies the subscribers).
      private boolean invalidState
      Boolean that's set to true when either rollbackEvent or endOfBranchMapReachedEvent is called.
      IEvent<BranchMap,​java.util.List<Action>> newActionsEvent
      Event other classes can subscribe to (when it is invoked it notifies the subscribers).
      private RollBackAction rollBackAction
      Action present in every branch map (a dedicated branch is created for this action).
      IEvent<BranchMap,​RollBackAction> rollbackEvent
      Event other classes can subscribe to (when it is invoked it notifies the subscribers).

    • Field Detail

      • newActionsEvent

        public final IEvent<BranchMap,​java.util.List<Action>> newActionsEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to (when it is invoked it notifies the subscribers). It is invoked when an action has been completed.

      • endOfBranchMapReachedEvent

        public final IEvent<BranchMap,​java.lang.Boolean> endOfBranchMapReachedEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to (when it is invoked it notifies the subscribers). It is invoked when the whole branch map has been completed.

      • rollbackEvent

        public final IEvent<BranchMap,​RollBackAction> rollbackEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to (when it is invoked it notifies the subscribers). It is invoked when a rollback action is completed.

      • invalidState

        private boolean invalidState
        Boolean that's set to true when either rollbackEvent or endOfBranchMapReachedEvent is called.

      • rollBackAction

        private RollBackAction rollBackAction
        Action present in every branch map (a dedicated branch is created for this action). Its role is to allow the player to fall back to the previous checkpoint.

      • branches

        private java.util.List<Branch> branches
        List of branches of actions that the map is managing

    • Constructor Detail

      • BranchMap

        public BranchMap​(java.util.List<Branch> branches)
        Constructor. It assigns the branches and subscribes to the events.
        Parameters:
        branches - List of branches of actions that the map is managing

      • BranchMap

        public BranchMap​(Branch... branches)

    • Method Detail

      • getPossibleActions

        public java.util.List<Action> getPossibleActions()
        Calculates the list of possible actions that the player can select based on their previous choices
        Returns:
        The list of possible actions the player can select based on their previous choices

      • endNow

        public void endNow()

      • onBranchActionCompleted

        private void onBranchActionCompleted​(Action completedAction)
        This method is called when an action is completed. It removes the completed action from the branches that had it and generates a newActionsEvent invocation.
        Parameters:
        completedAction - The action that has been finished

      • onBranchExtActionCompleted

        private void onBranchExtActionCompleted​(ExtendableAction extendableAction)
        This method is called when an extendable action is completed. It removes the completed action from the branches that had it and generates a newActionsEvent invocation.
        Parameters:
        extendableAction - The extendable action that has been finished

      • setupBranches

        private void setupBranches​(java.util.List<Branch> branches)
        Assigns the input parameter to the map's branches. Also subscribes to the 3 events those branches are connected to.
        Parameters:
        branches - List of branches the branch map is going to be made up of
